data.short_description: When you acces the profile of a person in Direct Messages and drag over his hypesquad badge with left click holded the badge disappears
data.steps_to_repro: - Select a person from your **Direct Messages** - Open his profile - Hold left click and drag the cursor over the hypesquad badge
